DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate side effect sirolimus ( rapamycin ) give combination chemotherapy ( Mitoxantrone + Etoposide + Cytarabine ( MEC ) ) high risk myeloid leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Sirolimus Combination With MEC High Risk Myeloid Leukemias
DOC.criteria: Must histologic evidence advance myeloid leukemia define one following : primary refractory nonM3 AML ; relapse nonM3 AML ; secondary AML ; intermediate poor prognosis de novo AML patient > = 60 year old > = 18 year age ECOG performance status 0 , 1 Able consume oral medication Initial laboratory value : creatinine < = 2.0 mg/dL ; total direct bilirubin < = 1.5/dL ; SGPT ( ALT ) < = 3xULN ; negative pregnancy test woman childbearing potential Ejection fraction > = 45 % Subjects FAM B3 Must receive chemotherapy ( except Hydroxyurea ) Not receive growth factor , except erythropoietin Subjects `` currently active '' second malignancy nonmelanoma skin cancer Subjects uncontrolled high blood pressure , unstable angina , symptomatic congestive heart failure , MI within last 6 month uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia Subjects take diltiazem Subjects require HIV protease inhibitor AIDSrelated illnesses No evidence cerebellar dysfunction baseline prior cytarabine therapy Not pregnant breastfeed Uncontrolled infection Subjects take Carbamazepine , Rifabutin , Rifampin , Rifapentine , St. John 's wort , Clarithromycin , Cyclosporine , Diltiazem , Erythromycin , Telithromycin , Verapamil , Tacrolimus
